form.page_subtitle: PNC Counselling: Treating Local Infections at Home> Treating Local Infections at Home TWO

field.name: Advise mother to do following home treatment four times daily for 7 days
Wash hands with soap under running water
Paint mouth with half strength gentian violet (0.25%) using a clean soft cloth or gauze wrapped around your finger
Wash hands again with soap under running water
Return to the clinic in 2 days if baby has not improved
